# Example using Active Lives data

```{r hex_map, echo=TRUE, fig.align='center', message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# load packages

ggplot(resulthex, aes(long.x,
                                lat.x,
                                fill=Male.Active,
                                group=group)) +
  geom_polygon(col="white") +
  scale_fill_viridis(option="magma", name = "Male Active", breaks = 0.1*0:9, labels = percent(0.1*0:9)) +
  coord_equal() + theme_void() +
  theme(text = element_text(family = "Poppins"))
```
